TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MTLDrawable_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddPresentedHandler (this Metal.IMTLDrawable This, Action<Metal.IMTLDrawable> block);
.method public static hidebysig void AddPresentedHandler(class Metal.IMTLDrawable This, class System.Action`1<class Metal.IMTLDrawable> block) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
The code that will be called after the drawable is displayed.
Docs.summary: Causes the provided to be run after the drawable is displayed.

.method public static hidebysig void PresentAfter(class Metal.IMTLDrawable This, float64 duration) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.

Docs.summary: Causes the drawable to be presented at least seconds after the previous drawable has been presented.
